markdownRemark.html:
Here is a snippet of code to use water sensor.

// Water Sensor + to Arduino 5V
// Water Sensor - to Arduino GND
// Water Sensor S to Arduino A5

void setup() {
  Serial.begin(9600);
}

void loop() {
  int resval = analogRead(5);
  Serial.println(resval);
}
